sen.e: After the bakufu issued "five rules regarding Doso and sake brewers scattered Rakuchu" in 1393 and started to levy the uniform yakusen tax on the Doso and sake brewers in Kyoto, Nosenkata (an institution to collect tax from moneylenders and sake breweries) was elected from leading Doso and sake brewers.
